home.title: Should I blame ……?
home.summaryParagraph: Hi! This is a site for all these "should I blame" questions, along with a brief description of the topic.
home.usageParagraph: You can click one of the items on the navigation menu, and share the URL to people who need the answer.

caching.description: Cache is an information technology for the temporary storage (caching) of Web documents, such as Web pages, images, and other types of Web multimedia, to reduce server lag. However, cache may get outdated quickly without updating, which may cause inconsistency and other problems. This page originates from {0}; you can find its source code on {1}.
